breakpoint.comment: The Highlight Board breakpoint at which styles change for padding, font size and button width.

content-width.comment: The maximum width of the content for the Highlight Board when it has an image.

type-reduction-percentage.comment: Percentage reduction value for the font size in the Highlight Board in narrow viewports.

height.comment: The height of the Highlight Board image

color.comment: The background color of the Highlight Board.

content-box-color.comment: The background color of the content box in the Highlight Board.
